snippet: Shares in the German company fell 13 percent after it said earnings had suffered because of the Russian ruble’s drop and other effects of the crisis.
abstract: Adidas reports estimated annual net profits of 650 million euros, or about $870 million, down from previous projection of 830 to 890 million euros; adjustment sends shares down 13 percent.
lead_paragraph: Shares in the German company fell 13 percent after it said earnings had suffered because of the Russian ruble’s drop and other effects of the crisis.

headline.main: Adidas Issues Profit Warning Tied to Ukraine Crisis
headline.print_headline: Adidas Profit Warning Tied to Ukraine Crisis
